name: ARIS
description:
⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀⠀ARIS - Arcade Shooter

A modern arcade shooter featuring a simple yet addictive concept.
Strategically clear your way of enemies to gather points, salvage killed enemies for extra points, all while avoiding and engaging in combat with other different types of enemies. Added effects and game mechanics make for challenging gameplay in a fast paced environment.

Wrapped with multiple twists, ARIS is guarenteed to keep you entertained and occupied. An endless gameplay environment seamlessly infused with Steam features allow for an enjoyable experience designed for the Steam/PC platform.

Game Features:
  • Endless Gameplay
  • Modern Arcade Feel
  • Smart AI Varying Upon Scenario/Enemy
  • Variety of Adversaries
  • Time Based Intensity
    and more...
Other Features/Functionalities:
  • Support for All Platforms (Windows, OSX, Linux)
  • Steam-Based Leaderboards
  • Steam Community Features/Integration
  • Steam Achievements
  • Steam Trading Cards
  • Steam Controller Support
    and more...
